articles.author: Jacqui Palumbo and Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: Joan Didion, famed American essayist and novelist, has died - CNN
articles.description: Didion was a leading figure of the New Journalism movement in the 1960s and '70s and an enduring literary influence.
articles.content:
artsUpdated 23rd December 2021
Acclaimed American writer Joan Didion, an essayist and novelist who rose to prominence in the 1960s, has died at age 87, her publisher confirmed to CNN on Thursday.

articles.title: NASA Set to Launch James Webb Telescope - Voice of America
articles.description: NASA looks likely to launch a much hyped and often-delayed space telescope. Plus, SpaceX makes history again, and a space tourist is already planning his next trip. VOA’s Arash Arabasadi brings us the Week in Space.

articles.title: Lily Collins shares snaps of her squeezing in a suitcase as she urges fans to watch Emily in Paris - Daily Mail
articles.description: The British-American actress, 32, posted an array of playful snaps to Instagram on Thursday showing her attempting to climb inside a large silver suitcase.
articles.content:

articles.title: US COVID-19 case spike derails many Americans' holiday plans - CNA
articles.description:
WASHINGTON: Americans are facing a second Christmas of upended holiday plans, with a surge in COVID-19 infections fuelled by the now-dominant Omicron variant forcing some people to cancel travel and fret about whether it is safe to visit loved ones.
